content: {A想象}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, your harvest fair...{短暂停} everthin' looks so tasty! All those sproutsies are makin' the air smell sweet 'n' fresh.
info: 庄园展览-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A期待}It's even more rewardin' and joyful than growin' great crops myself.
info: 庄园展览-云果_主流程文本3

content: I've got a gift for you to celebrate the fair. Hope you like it! <style=SizeSmall>I hope you're gonna hold another fair soon...</style>
info: 庄园展览-云果_主流程文本3

content: Thank you! I get this kinda... special sense of achievement!
info: 庄园展览-云果_主流程文本3
